sentence: Aiken also took aim at controversial Republican lawmakers by name, including North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn, whom he called a white nationalist.
author: Kate Scanlon
title: Former American Idol contestant Clay Aiken launches second bid for Congress

sentence: But after watching noted shitbag Madison Cawthorn rise to prominence in the House over the past two years and listening to North Carolina's Lieutenant Governor go on a baldly homophobic rant in November, he felt compelled to get back in the mix.
author: Drew Schwartz
title: We Asked a Campaign Strategist If Clay Aiken (???) Could Actually Get Elected to Congress

sentence: They're running out of things to throw at me... Share your most embarrassing vacay pics in the repliesg??https://t.co/YicRk0Albu Madison Cawthorn (@CawthornforNC) April 22, 2022 9 days ago: According to reporting from the local site Smoky Mountain News, Lisa Wiggins, a former caseworker and aide to the lawmaker, filed a workplace complaint against the congressman claiming that Cawthorn denied her leave when two family members passed away within the same week.
title: A new Democratic super PAC is endorsing 11 more candidates and spending $10 million in primary contests.
